11. Lab VM Notes Post Clone¶

11.1. Setting up Django First Time¶

sudo yum install -y django

Warning

this may be sketch

Note

pip for user is from python3, pip root is python2.7. use pip …… –user

Setup Django:

$ python ./manage.py migrate
$ python ./manage.py createsuperuser

Note

using the tag “python” runs python 3.6

Make a “superuser” account

11.2. Managing the Server¶

  1. navigate to /checkouts/readthedocs.org

  2. Manage the server:
    python ./manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
